description: Adâncime execuțională necesară - determină detaliile tehnice, profunzimea analizei și expertise requirements

foundational.label: Foundational
foundational.description: Concepte de bază, principii generale, introducere în domeniu
foundational.output_characteristics: simple frameworks, basic checklists, introductory guides

standard.label: Standard
standard.description: Practici standard de industrie, metodologii dovedite
standard.output_characteristics: detailed playbooks, standard operating procedures, best practices

advanced.label: Advanced
advanced.description: Strategii sofisticate, optimizări complexe, integrări multiple
advanced.detail_level: deep analysis, advanced techniques, multi-system integration
advanced.output_characteristics: sophisticated strategies, technical specifications, advanced frameworks

expert.label: Expert
expert.description: Cutting-edge approaches, research-level depth, innovation required
expert.detail_level: exhaustive analysis, research methodology, innovation frameworks
expert.expertise_required: expert-level knowledge, research background, innovation capability
expert.output_characteristics: research-grade analysis, novel methodologies, expert-level technical specs

language_sophistication.foundational: simple terminology, avoid jargon, explain concepts clearly
language_sophistication.standard: industry standard terminology, assume basic domain knowledge
language_sophistication.advanced: sophisticated vocabulary, technical precision, domain expertise assumed
language_sophistication.expert: cutting-edge terminology, research-level language, innovation focus

analysis_depth.foundational: broad overview, key concepts, basic relationships
analysis_depth.standard: detailed analysis, standard methodologies, proven approaches
analysis_depth.advanced: multi-dimensional analysis, complex relationships, optimization focus
analysis_depth.expert: exhaustive analysis, research methodology, novel approaches

prerequisite_knowledge.expert: expert-level knowledge, research background, innovation capability

high_risk_domains.description: Pentru fintech, healthcare, legal - complexity minimă = standard

innovation_domains.description: Pentru AI/ML, Web3 - complexity poate fi expert pentru breakthrough
